episode_desc: Janak welcomes Vishwamitra, Ram and Lakshman in Mithila, where Vishwamitra has decided to take a rest. While in there, Ram first sets eyes upon Janak's daughter, Princess Sita; in the royal garden.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Sita's Swayamvara
episode_desc: Seeking a suitable husband for his daughter, Janak holds a Swayamvar. Kings and Princes from all over come to Mithila seeking Sita's hand in marriage, yet fail to pass King Janak's test of stringing the Shiv Dhanush bow.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Sita's swayamvar and Parasuram
episode_desc: Shiv Dhanus was broken by prince Rama when he attempted to string the bow, during the swayamvara of Sita, thereby winning the princess's hand in marriage. After the marriage when his father Dasharatha was returning to Ayodhya with Rama, Parashurama obstructed their path and challenged Rama for breaking his guru Shiva's bow.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Marriage Preparations
episode_desc: King Janak sends word to Ayodhya to inform King Dasharath of the engagement of their two children. Overjoyed, the entire Ayodhya royal family come to Mithila to prepare for the wedding. After further discussion between the two royal families, it is decided that the four princes of Ayodhya will wed the four princesses of Videha.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

episode_desc: King Janak tearfully bids farewell tho his beloved daughter Sita, as she departs for Ayodhya with her new husband and family. The four daughters-in-law are welcomed in Ayodhya.

show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

episode_desc: Hanuman kills Kalnemi, reaches Dronagiri, lifts the whole peak and flies back. Hit by Bharat's arrow, he falls down in Ayodhya. Sushen Vaidya saves Lakshman with Sanjeevani her.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Indrajit goes to perform a tantrik yajna
episode_desc: Indrajit goes to perform a tantrik yajna. Indrajit comes out as the yajna is disrupted. He fights with Lakshman.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Ravan challenges Ram and Lakshman
episode_desc: Ravan decides to kill Sita. Maydanav holds tells him that he should go to the battlefield instead. He enters the battlefield like a whirlwind and challenges Ram and Lakshman.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Ravan attacks Shri Ram
episode_desc: Ravan attacks Shri Ram with all his pent up fury. Enraged Bibhishan, Sugriv and others attack Ravan, who becomes unconscious. His charioteer drives away from the battlefield.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Indra sends his chariot for Shri Ram
episode_desc: Mandodari, while nursing Ravan's wounds, begs him to surrender to Shri Ram. Indra sends his chariot for Shri Ram. Shri Ram circumbulates the chariot and ascends it.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Lord Ram kills Demon Ravan
episode_desc: Vibhishana told Rama that Ravana's weakest point was in his navel. Rama with his powerful arrow shot Ravana in the navel, then Ram used Brahmastra and killed him.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Agni-pariksha
episode_desc: After Ravan's last rites are performed, Bibishan is crowned in a magnificent ceremony. Shri Ram requests Bibhishan to send Sita to the Camp. Sita arrives and undergoes agni-pariksha.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Shri Ram heads for Ayodhya
episode_desc: Brahma comes and makes obeisance to Shri Ram. Bibhishan offers his Pushpak Viman and they leave for Ayodhaya. Shri Ram stops near the ashram of Rishi Bhardwaj and sends Hanuman to inform Bharat of his arrival. As the news of Shri Ram's arrival reaches Ayodhya, the people are overjoyed.
show_desc: An adaptation of the ancient epic, in which the exiled Prince Rama and his brother Laxman set out to save Rama's wife, Sita, who has been kidnapped by the demon king of Lanka Ravana.

title: Ram Reaches Ayodhya
episode_desc: Shri Ram reaches Ayodhya. The coronation of Shri Ram. The people sing praises of Shri Ram.
